channel.title: keepalived on (power up)
channel.description: Recent content in keepalived on (power up)

item.title: keepalived安装配置
item.description: QQ: 380800878, 微信: kittenll 下载源码包，直接上官方网站 解压 tar -xzvf keepalived-1.2.7.tar.gz 编译安装，没什么特别的，指定一下安装目录即可 # cd keepalived-1.2.7 # ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/keepalived-1.2.7 # make # make install 添加软链，升级测试方便 # cd
